plot: Women are being murdered nationwide by a killer who leaves no trace of evidence, no fatal wounds, no signs of struggle, and no clues to an apparent motive. All the victims have one thing in common: they each knew Jack Reacher.
characters: Jodie Garber, Julia Lamarr, Alison Lamarr, Rita Scimecca, Tony Poulton, Alan Deerfield, Nelson Blake, James Cozo, Lisa Harper, Jack Reacher
setting: Quantico, Virginia New York City, New York
